title.value: Definition of relationship between protective properties and magnitude of antibody titer after mice immunization with the various factions of antigen Bordetella bronchiseptica
Определение зависимости между защитными свойствами и   величиной титра антител при иммунизации мышей различными фракциями антигена Bordetella bronchiseptica

journal.title: Epizootiology, Immunobiology, Pharmacology, Sanitary Science : international scientific and practical journal

person.name: Gelejsha, N.A., National Academy of Sciences. Scientific and Practical Center of Animal Breding (Belarus). The S.N. Vyshelesskij Inst. of Experimental Veterinary Medicine

abstract.value: In the conditions of the Republic of Belarus there were compared the results of the experiment to determine the protective effect of different fractions of Bordetella bronchiseptica antigen and antibody titer values in mice following immunization with this antigen. In course of the experiment there was used the strain Bordetella bronchiseptica KhMiEhV-V120 isolated from lung tissue of a piglet sick with pneumonia. The results of the experiment showed that presence in mice of antibodies in titre in minimum 1:8 to Bordetella bronchiseptica provided their resistance to introduction of infection by Bordetella bronchiseptica culture. It was determined that the presence of the mouse protective antibodies galleries least 1:16 protects mice from infection with this antigen. That is why it was proved  that determination of the titre of antibodies could be used as an informative method for the evaluation of immunogenic properties of the vaccine against Bordetella. It was efficient to use in spite of whole cell antigen Bordetella bronchiseptica its fractions in value no more than 100 kilo Dalton and 5-100 kilo Dalton.
